CREATE TABLE posts ( post_idx BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, board_idx BIGINT NOT NULL, write_member_idx BIGINT NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(200) , contents TEXT , attached_file VARCHAR(200) , hits INT DEFAULT 0 , status_code INT DEFAULT 0 , created_date DATETIME , modified_date DATETIME , deleted_date DATETIME ,
FOREIGN KEY(board_idx) REFERENCES board(board_idx) , FOREIGN KEY(write_member_idx) REFERENCES member(member_idx) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci

changeSet.sql: CREATE INDEX idx_posts_1 ON posts(board_idx, created_date)
CREATE INDEX idx_posts_2 ON posts(board_idx, write_member_idx)
